Package algorithms.imageProcessing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IKernel  
    ILineThinner  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCurvatureScaleSpaceMapper  
    AbstractLineThinner  
    CannyEdgeFilter
    The CannyEdge filter is an algorithm to operate on an image to replace objects with their edges.
    ClosedCurveAndJunctionFinder
    Looks through each curve to see if the start and ends meet within an allowed gap, and if so, replaces the PairIntArray with a PairIntArrayWithColor and color='1'.
    CMDLineCornerDetector
    a wrapper to allow a user to run parts of the application from a command line interface (for corner detection).
    CMDLineInflectionUtil
    a wrapper to allow a user to run parts of the application from a command line interface (for inflection detection and image transformation calculation).
    CMDLineMain
    a wrapper to suggest command line usage options.
    ContourFinder
    class to identity contours in scale space images.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceContour
    class holding data for a contour for an edge in a scale space image.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceContourMatcher
    class to match the contours extracted from two images and match them.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceCornerDetector
    The code is implemented from interpreting several papers by the authors Farzin Mokhtarian and Alan Mackworth.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceImageMaker
    given an image, creates scale space maps to find inflection points and creates scale space contours for the closed curves from those points.
    CurvatureScaleSpaceImagePoint  
    CurvatureScaleSpaceInflectionMapper
    class to map contours from one image to another and return the matched inflection points and a transformation matrix that can be applied to the first to put it into the frame of the second.
    DescendingSigmaComparator  
    DoubleLinkedCircularList
    a doubly linked list with a sentinel in between the last and first item.
    EdgeExtractor
    Edge extractor operates on an image that has already been reduced to holding single pixel width lines where the original image was.
    ErosionFilter
    The erosion filter iterates over all pixels in the image, checking whether the current non-null pixel can be nulled without disconnecting any adjacent pixels.
    Gaussian1D
    1 ( -(x - mu)^2 ) f = ------------------ * exp( ----------- ) sigma * sqrt(2*pi) ( 2o~^2 )
    Gaussian1DFirstDeriv
    class to retrieve a kernel for the first derivative of a gaussian of a given sigma.
    Gaussian1DSecondDeriv
    class to retrieve a kernel for the first derivative of a gaussian of a given sigma.
    GreyscaleImage  
    Heap
    Class contains a Fibonacci heap, that is, a loose collection of trees based upon binomial heaps, hence satisfying the minimum heap property: object.child.key >= object.key.
    HeapNode  
    HistogramEqualization
    calculate the transformation function for an image to perform histogram equalization on it, that is change the range of intensities to fill the possible range.
    Image  
    ImageDisplayer  
    ImageDisplayer.DisposableJFrame  
    ImageIOHelper  
    ImageProcesser  
    ImageStatistics  
    ImageStatisticsHelper  
    Kernel  
    Kernel1DHelper  
    LowIntensityRemovalFilter  
    MatchedPointsTransformationCalculator  
    MiscellaneousCurveHelper  
    NextContour
    A class to serve the purpose of an adjacency matrix (via rules to choose the "neighbor contour") and the state of "un-visited" for the A* search algorithm.
    PointMatcher
    class to match the points extracted from two images.
    ScaleSpaceCurvature  
    ScaleSpaceCurve
    Holds X(t, sigma), Y(t, sigma), k(t, sigma) and the array t where t is the range of indexes for the curve in edges, normalized to values that range from 0 to 1.
    ScaleSpaceCurveImage
    Holds the inflection points of a curve convolved over many sigma until there are no new inflection points.
    SobelX
    shows horizontal changes in an image
    SobelY
    shows vertical changes in an image
    StereoProjectionTransformer
    class to solve for the epipoles for two images with stereo projection and apply the solution.
    TransformationPair  
    TransformationParameters  
    TransformationPointFit  
    Transformer
